docs.snippet: The disclosures ripped away the diplomatic jargon and political niceties of a former secretary of state with a sober, thoughtful reputation....
docs.lead_paragraph: The disclosures ripped away the diplomatic jargon and political niceties of a former secretary of state with a sober, thoughtful reputation.
docs.abstract: Hacked emails sent by former Sec of State Colin L Powell reveal way he feels about presidential candidates Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton; emails highlight Powell's frustration with Clinton and his intense disdain for Trump, whom he calls national disgrace and international pariah.

headline.main: Colin Powell, in Hacked Emails, Shows Scorn for Trump and Irritation at Clinton
